snippet: Greek bakers in the northern city of Thessaloniki have made a giant "koulouri," a ring bread similar to a bagel, around the city's most visible monument, the medieval White Tower....

headline.print_headline: Greek Bakers Encircle Monument With Ring Bread
headline.main: Greek Bakers Encircle Monument With Ring Bread

lead_paragraph: Greek bakers in the northern city of Thessaloniki have made a giant "koulouri," a ring bread similar to a bagel, around the city's most visible monument, the medieval White Tower.
